resources.string:
Charades is a word guessing game. A player acts out the word on the screen, while other player(s) try to guess the word. 

 Interesting Features: 
 1. There is an in-built timer, so you do not have to worry about a physical stopwatch. 

 2. You don't have to necessarily keep count. You can just try to beat the high score. 

 I had fun making this, and hope you have fun playing it. 
 
 Cheers. Zennymorh.
